## fromBytes() function

Create a Uint8Array from an array of byte values. Equivalent to `Buffer.from([...])`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function fromBytes(values: number[]): Uint8Array;
```

</td><td>

Byte values (0-255)


</td></tr>
